main event: A witness saw a white object the size of a basketball that was stationary in the sky for 15 seconds.
interesting points: The object had a solid center and blurred edges.
The witness thought the object was possibly a measurement device being used at a nearby airport.
The sighting occurred in daylight conditions.
The object did not move, it just sat in the sky.
The witness was unsure of the nature of the object.
sighted object: a white, basketball-sized object with a solid center and blurred edges
